title: Mumbai falling behind
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `v2.47.0`

OS & Version: debian 11

Commit hash: 

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

```    command: "  --config=/erigon/config/config.toml --downloader.verify --snap.stop --sentry.drop-useless-peers=true  --bor.heimdall=\"http://heimdall:1317\" --torrent.upload.rate=\"512mb\" --torrent.download.rate=\"512mb\"  "```
config.toml:
```
datadir = "/erigon/data/erigon"
port = "30303"
chain = "mumbai"
http = "true"
prune = "hrtc"

"http.addr" = "0.0.0.0"
"http.api" = "eth,bor,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,miner"
"http.port" = "8565"
"http.corsdomain" = "*"
"http.vhosts" = "*"

"torrent.port" = 30305
```

Concensus Layer: heimdall 0.3.4


Chain/Network: Mumbai

#### Expected behaviour
Chain remains in sync


#### Actual behaviour
Chain continuously falls behind, takes a while to catch back up and then shows sync status as synced while it is in fact falling behind tip.


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I have tried adding ```--downloader.verify --snap.stop --sentry.drop-useless-peers=true``` flags but issue still persists

![image](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/assets/57159226/6f5100af-6478-4e44-a3ca-b6a2db78856a)
